item.title: 大量空头押注使债券面临后CPI挤压
item.description: 在一份关键的通胀报告公布之前，国债交易员们已经变得非常看空，以至于如果通胀数据不尽如人意，他们就有可能受到挤压。【原文：Treasury bond traders have turned so bearish ahead of a key inflation report that they risk getting squeezed on a less than red-hot reading.】

item.title: 投资者为秘鲁 70 亿美元养老金提取法案做好准备
item.description: 投资者担心，允许秘鲁人动用其退休储蓄的提案可能会迫使养老基金出售资产，以便腾出多达 70 亿美元的资金用于提取。【原文：Investors fear a proposal that would allow Peruvians to tap their retirement savings could force pension funds to sell assets in order to make as much as $7 billion available for withdrawal.】

item.title: S&P因纽约州敦刻尔克的金融风险而下调评级，随后又撤销评级
item.description: 纽约州敦刻尔克市（Dunkirk）是一个拥有约 13,000 人口的城市，正在寻求州政府的帮助以弥补运营和资本基金赤字，S&P 全球评级公司将其信用评级下调了三个等级，降至最低投资级别。【原文：Dunkirk, New York, a city of about 13,000 seeking state help to close operating and capital fund deficits, had its credit rating slashed three notches by S&P Global Ratings to the lowest investment grade.】

item.title: 梅西百货因在代理权争夺战中威胁加快债务偿还而被起诉
item.description: 一家养老基金在起诉梅西百货公司时声称，梅西百货公司将其债务协议 "武器化"，作为与两家投资公司代理权争夺战的一部分，使其财务未来面临风险。【原文：Macy’s Inc. has “weaponized” its debt agreements as part of a proxy fight with a pair of investment firms, putting its financial future at risk, a pension fund claimed in suing the retailer.】

item.title: Enverus称石油峰值不会在2030年前出现，因为电动汽车的影响正在减弱
item.description: 能源研究机构Enverus表示，由于燃油经济性标准不尽如人意以及美国电动汽车的采用速度放缓，全球石油需求不会在本十年结束前达到顶峰。【原文：Global oil demand won’t peak before the end of this decade because of underwhelming fuel economy standards and slowing adoption of electric vehicles in the US, energy researcher Enverus says.】

item.title: 债券交易员在通胀数据公布前夕下创纪录的期货赌注
item.description: 周二，美国短期利率期货大宗交易创下历史之最，帮助推动了国债市场的上涨。【原文：A block trade in US short-term interest-rate futures Tuesday was the biggest on record and helped drive gains for the Treasury market.】

item.title: 美联储关键机制缩水 1.75 万亿美元后趋于稳定
item.description: 美联储一个重要机构的余额缩减目前似乎已经见底，这为央行在税季期间的储备提供了流动性缓冲。【原文：The drawdown of balances at a key Federal Reserve facility appears to have bottomed out for now, providing a liquidity cushion for the central bank’s reserves during tax season.】

item.title: 摩根大通和贝莱德是 BLS 经济学家的 CPI "超级用户 "之一
item.description: 劳工统计局的一名经济学家就美国一项关键的通货膨胀指标的相关数据与摩根大通公司和贝莱德公司等华尔街大公司进行了通信，这引发了关于公平获取经济信息的问题。【原文：An economist from the Bureau of Labor Statistics corresponded on data related to a key US inflation gauge with major Wall Street firms like JPMorgan Chase & Co. and BlackRock Inc., raising questions about equitable access to economic information.】

item.title: 在利率和反垄断的担忧中，仲裁交易商看到了交易的缓慢复苏
item.description: 兼并套利投资者表示，面对高利率、持续的反垄断担忧和大选年政治，交易流量从去年的低迷中反弹的基础并不稳固。【原文：Merger-arbitrage investors say that a rebound in deal flow from last year’s doldrums is on shaky ground in the face of elevated interest rates, persistent antitrust concerns and election-year politics.】

item.title: 不列颠哥伦比亚省三年内第三次被下调信用评级
item.description: 在省政府决定增加借贷后，S&P 全球评级公司将不列颠哥伦比亚省的信用评级下调至 AA-，前景展望为负面。【原文：British Columbia’s credit rating was cut to AA- by S&P Global Ratings with a negative outlook — its third downgrade in three years — after the provincial government decided to ramp up borrowing.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将按兵不动，讨论何时开始放松利率：决策指南
item.description: 加拿大央行很可能维持利率不变，避免发出即将降息的信号，因为官员们仍在评估启动宽松货币政策的合适时机。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to leave interest rates unchanged and avoid signaling that cuts are imminent, as officials continue to assess the right moment to launch into easier monetary policy.】

item.title: 顶级石油交易员日渐看涨原油
item.description: 在油价数月来首次突破每桶 90 美元后，全球最大的大宗商品交易商对下半年石油市场的看涨信心与日俱增。【原文：The world’s biggest commodity traders are increasingly confident of a bullish oil market into the second half of the year after prices pierced $90 a barrel for the first time in months.】

item.title: 英国环境主管回绝泰晤士河水务公司业主的求助
item.description: 英国环境大臣拒绝了泰晤士水务公司所有者的直接求助，这凸显了政府在金融危机中努力置身事外的决心，英国最大的水务公司也因此受到震撼。【原文：Britain’s environment secretary rejected a direct appeal for help from the owners of Thames Water, underscoring the government’s efforts to stay out of the financial crisis rocking the UK’s largest water company.】

item.title: 必和必拓将取代 Codelco 成为全球最大的铜生产商
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）估计，随着必和必拓集团（BHP Group）在全球铜生产商排名中超越科德尔科公司（Codelco），铜业即将迎来新的领军者。【原文：The copper industry is about to get a new leader as BHP Group overtakes Codelco in the global producer rankings, according to Bloomberg Intelligence estimates.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体联合创始人赢得质疑股份禁售的权利
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司的两位联合创始人获得了特拉华州法官的许可，可以在针对前总统的诉讼中就其股票价值增加新的索赔要求，这是两周前股票上市交易引发的最新法律纠纷。【原文：Two co-founders of Donald Trump’s social-media startup won permission from a Delaware judge to add new claims to their lawsuit against the former president over the value of their shares, the latest legal fallout from a deal that took the stock public two weeks ago.】

item.title: 为什么法国一度价值 150 亿美元的科技冠军需要国家援助？
item.description: 2017 年，Atos SE 现金充裕，市值高达 150 亿美元，似乎在竞购一切可以竞购的东西。【原文：Flush with cash and riding a $15 billion market value in 2017, Atos SE seemed to be bidding for anything and everything it could.】

item.title: 出口激增，企业获批建设得克萨斯州油港
item.description: 企业产品合伙公司（Enterprise Products Partners）克服了最后一个监管障碍，拟在得克萨斯州沿海建造一个深水油港，旨在帮助创纪录的石油出口流向亚洲和欧洲市场。【原文：Enterprise Products Partners overcame the last regulatory hurdle to build a proposed deepwater oil port off the coast of Texas aimed at helping record oil exports to flow to markets in Asia and Europe.】

item.title: 交易员对新兴市场债券反弹持自 2013 年 "缩表 "以来最怀疑态度
item.description: 卖空者正在对新兴市场的美元债券进行十多年来最大的押注，因为他们猜测近期的涨势已经过头。【原文：Short sellers are making the biggest bets against emerging-market dollar bonds in more than a decade on speculation that the recent rally has gone too far.】

item.title: 施莱格尔称，比起赔付，瑞士央行必须更倾向于积累资金
苏富比计划以艺术品和收藏品为抵押进行 5 亿美元债券拍卖
item.description: 电信亿万富翁帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）旗下的苏富比拍卖行计划通过向艺术品收藏家提供个人贷款支持的债券借款约 5 亿美元。【原文：Sotheby’s, the auction house owned by telecom billionaire Patrick Drahi, plans to borrow about $500 million through bonds backed by personal loans made to art collectors.】

item.title: 为什么 "代币化 "资产会让银行对加密货币产生兴趣？
item.description: 加密货币是在 2008-2009 年金融危机的热潮中发明的，目的是为银行提供一种替代方案。比特币的发明者化名为中本聪（Satoshi Nakamoto），他们设想了一种不依赖于 "可信第三方 "的金融系统，因为他们认为这些第三方本来就不可信。取而代之的是，它将使用加密技术和名为区块链的分散式分类账来记录交易，并提供无可辩驳的所有权证明。加密技术的布道者们说，这将消除 "不信任"。【原文：Cryptocurrencies were invented in the heat of the 2008-2009 financial crisis to provide an alternative to banks. The inventors of Bitcoin, who went by the pseudonym Satoshi Nakamoto, envisioned a financial system that didn’t depend on “trusted third parties” that they said couldn’t be trusted in the first place. Instead, it would use cryptography and a decentralized ledger called a blockchain to record transactions and provide irrefutable proof of ownership. Crypto evangelists said this would de】

item.title: 富国银行聘用德意志银行的巴特负责杠杆融资业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）聘请了德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）杠杆融资部门联席主管亚历山德拉-巴特（Alexandra Barth）。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. hired Alexandra Barth, co-head of leveraged finance at Deutsche Bank AG, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 交易员因降息押注而一年来最看空加元
item.description: 交易员对加元的看跌程度为一年来最高，因为他们预计加拿大央行决策者将在周三宣布降息决定时发出降息电报，甚至可能出人意料地推出宽松政策。【原文：Traders are the most bearish on the Canadian dollar in a year on expectations that Bank of Canada policymakers will telegraph interest-rate cuts when they announce their decision on Wednesday, or possibly even deliver a surprise easing.】

item.title: 千禧年关闭 Jason Feasey 的信贷交易，因为 Altice 的赌注变了味
item.description: 千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）正在清算信用交易专家杰森-费伊（Jason Feasey）的赌注，因为他对电信网络阿尔迪斯（Altice）的押注造成了这家对冲基金公司的损失。【原文：Millennium Management is liquidating wagers made by credit trading specialist Jason Feasey after his bets on telecom network Altice caused losses at the hedge fund firm.】

item.title: 意大利 Enel 发电厂发生爆炸，六人失踪
item.description: 据《共和国报》等意大利媒体报道，意大利北部 Enel SpA 公司的一座水电站发生爆炸，造成至少六人失踪，四人受伤。【原文：A hydro-power plant owned by Enel SpA in Northern Italy was hit by an explosion leaving at least six people missing and four injured, according to Italian media including La Repubblica.】

item.title: 阿根廷拉里奥哈债权人为债券拖欠问题备战
item.description: 阿根廷拉里奥哈省（La Rioja）的债权人在可能的债务谈判之前聘请了顾问，因为他们与官员们就超过 1600 万美元的债券付款问题争论不休。【原文：Creditors of Argentina’s La Rioja province tapped advisers ahead of potential debt talks as they quibble with officials over more than $16 million in bond payments.】

item.title: Diamondback 启动债券销售，为收购 Endeavor 提供资金支持
item.description: 钻石背能源公司（Diamondback Energy Inc）正在利用美国投资级市场发行债券，为其 260 亿美元收购 Endeavor Energy Resources LP 提供部分资金。【原文：Diamondback Energy Inc. is tapping the US investment-grade market with a bond offering to partly help fund its $26 billion takeover of Endeavor Energy Resources LP, joining other blue-chip companies capitalizing on robust investor demand to bring acquisition-related debt deals.】

item.title: 加拿大债务的 "隐蔽角落 "让投资者收获大涨
item.description: 在浮躁的信贷市场中寻求优势的投资者正在抢购一种不知名的加拿大债务，这种债务已经在债券中带来了一些最好的回报。【原文：Investors searching for an edge in frothy credit markets are snatching up an obscure type of Canadian debt that’s already delivered some of the best returns among bonds.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称美国企业发出信号：美联储是时候放宽政策了
item.description:
他建议收听财报电话会议，其中传达的信息清晰而响亮

。【原文：

Listen to earnings calls, he advises, and the message is loud and clear

】

item.title: 欧盟将对乌克兰免关税贸易延期制定更严格的规则
item.description: 欧盟更接近于延长与乌克兰的免关税贸易，同时收紧了食品进口规则，以安抚抗议农民对供应过剩的担忧。【原文：The European Union moved closer to extending its tariff-free trade with Ukraine, while tightening rules on food imports to placate protesting farmers’ concerns about oversupply.】
